item.description: Boxes Common Box This box is mostly meant as a shared template for other functions to be calling. While it can be used individually, users should strongly consider relying on other functions. The _common_box method creates two rectangles, one for the heading and one for the body of the box. Both are optional and can be left out. This box also automatically considers the currently defined theme and styles the box accordingly.

Themes ( "body_color": black, "body_background": white, "heading_color": white, "heading_background": rgb(25, 61, 112), ) Setting a new Theme update_theme(..args) Updating a Theme set_theme( theme: [dict] ) Example Themes uni_fr
